1.title: Baskana Suikast
1.plot: Galip Dervis tries to solve the assassination attempt to the candidate mayor of Istanbul, which ends with the death of the mayor's security guard. He is called to solve the case after 4 years and Galip is so excited because he thinks that maybe he will return to the corps.

2.title: Dervis ve Medyum
2.plot: Filiz Akerman, the wife of the ex-inspector Mithat Akerman secretly disappeared and is found by medium Susu. All the people, except Galip Dervis, believes that Filiz died because of an accident. Galip is so confused about the case that he decides to talk with Susu.

3.title: Fil Hamdi
3.plot: The famous solicitor Lale Safranoglu is killed and while she was on the phone she said that her killer is Hamdi "Fil Hamdi" Donmez, a famous builder and banker. But Hamdi never got up from his bed for 10 years because of his weight. So, Galip was called to solve this case.

4.title: Deprem
4.plot: An earthquake happens in Istanbul with intensity 5,4. A philantropist called Hakan Erim is killed during the earthquake. Galip suffers from a dissociative attack because of the earthquake. Hulya, her mother and her son stays at her sister's home because of the street where their home was located was closed. Also she meets with Selim, who introduced himself as a reporter, without knowing that he intends to kill her.

5.title: Dervis ve Televizyon Yildizi
5.plot: Zafer Uzungol, who is the star of the TV series "Ipucu" murdered his wife and had exculpated himself. Galip becomes suspicious of him but nobody believes that Zafer is the killer.

6.title: Dervis ve Milyoner Soyguncu
6.plot: Engin Onparmak, a former security chief, kills a mugger for protecting his girlfriend Pelin and himself. The incident becomes bigger as the mugger was Faruk Altiyol, one of the wealthiest person of the Turkey.

7.title: Dervis ve Diger Kadin
7.plot: A lawyer and his assistant were found dead at their law firm. Galip starts to flirt with a woman called Leyla. Everybody but Galip believes that she was the killer of three people. Not listening everybody, Galip discovers the killer and solves the case.

8.title: Dervis Evleniyor
8.plot: A man kills his partner for getting goldens from 1800s. The goldens are hidden in a house, nowadays a marriage therapy clinic. He marries with Ahmet's mom and goes to that clinic. For stopping him, also Galip and Hulya goes to the clinic, pretending that they are married.

9.title: Dervis ve Cok Cok Yasli Adam
9.plot: Necmi, a 114 year man who worked in municipality as a gardener for years, was murdered before he breaks the world record as oldest man in the world. Izzet's wife, Latife, also made a documentary about him. His murder affects her and she becomes suspicious. Because of a fight between her and Izzet, Izzet starts to live in Galip's home.

10.title: Dervis ve Yeni Türkü
10.plot: Derya Koroglu, the lead singer of the band "Yeni Turku", threatens Sercan, known as Kisik, to pay his debt, otherwise he won't go to Ankara. Next day, Kisik was murdered in the back street of the building, where the radio channel is located. Derya was supposed to be a guest in a programme in radio, so he was there. When Kisik was shot, there were two people: Derya and a screaming blind woman, Sevin. When Galip learns that Derya is the suspect, he is surprised because he is a fan of Yeni Turku, he and Belgin used to listen them. When Galip explores the crime scene, ...

11.title: Dervis ve Kirazli Turta
11.plot: Hulya recieves a call from Galip's older brother, Fazil. He thinks that his neighbour has murdered his wife and he has strong evidence. He says that if Galip would help him, they would solve the case. Galip rejects to see him at first, but then he accepts and he goes to his home with Hulya.

12.title: Dervis Kibris'ta
12.plot: During a parachute lesson in Northern Cyprus, a student from Istanbul was killed by falling from the aeroplane. But the doctor reveals that he died from suffocation in his post-mortem report and his lungs contained an amount of water. But there wasn't any water in the place where he was falled. With the governor's consent, Galip and Hulya goes to Northern Cyprus to investigate the incident. Galip brought his food and drink in his suitcase but because that his suitcase was stolen from Hulya's car, Galip stays hungry and thirsty for days and also Hulya loses all her ...

13.title: Dervis'in Kafa Gitti
13.plot: During the charging of a suspect called Serdar Tugla, Izzet was shot from his arm and stays in hospital for a day. Ahmet begins to investigation with Galip. When Izzet was shot, a woman committed suicide with jumping from her balcony. Galip is tired of being "extraordinary". He wants to live like everyone, he wants to be happy. Dr. Firat gives him a medicine for this and Galip takes it. When he takes the medicine, he becomes an another person.

14.title: Dervis Okulda
14.plot: Murat Terzi is a successful science teacher in a high school. When he learns that his girlfriend who is a literature teacher in the same school is pregnant, he kills him and makes a plan that would show she has committed suicide. It's the same high school as Belgin was graduated and the principal of the school, who was a good friend of Belgin, calls Galip to help. But Murat has a strong evidence, he was doing an exam to his students during the suicide. Galip tries to solve the case, as he struggles with the intelligence of Murat.

15.title: Dervis ve Bebek
15.plot: A orphan named Can finds a sliced finger, while playing in the park. When Galip starts to investigate the case, he is fascinated by Can and thinks that he resembles him. He loves him so much and he wants to adopt him. He tries to take care of Can for a while. Meanwhile, a violinist named Halil was kidnapped and his capturers wants ransom. His mother wants help from Galip.

16.title: Dervis Kampta
16.plot: After eye-witnessing to the murder by a leader of drug dealer gang, Galip is shuffled off to a safe location until the trial. But there, Galip suspects of an another murder: a woman killed her husband. He proves that the woman is the killer everyone but Suat. Meanwhile, Ahmet dates with a girl and falls in love with her.

17.title: Dervis Isten Kovuluyor
17.plot: A broken body of a woman is found and Galip is investigating the case. But Sevki, the deputy chief who hates Galip, fires him when Galip did a mistake. Galip manages to solve the case, while trying to get his job back.

18.title: Dervis ve Yeni Hemsire
18.plot: Hulya starts to seeing extraordinary images that haunts her. She is sure that she has lost her sanity and she blames Galip for that. She decides to quit job and concentrate to her creative writing class.

1.title: Dervis ve Yeni Psikolog
1.plot: The cleaner of Dr. Firat's office, Turkan Bagci, is found dead. Just because she was found dead in his office, Firat quits from his job and makes Galip to go another shrink.

2.title: Dervis ve Mafya
2.plot: Nephews of Cavit Sonmezoglu, the most famous godfather of Istanbul, were killed in a barber shop by an unidentified person. Cavit wants to hire Galip for discovering the killer. Galip turns the offer because of his fear of mafia. The intelligence office wants to use Galip for tracing Cavit and they offer Galip to becoming a police officer again. Galip accepts this and tries to find the killer. Also, Hulya flirts with Cavit's nephew Ali, but soon she finds out that she was tricked by him.

3.title: Dervis ve Aktör
3.plot: A woman called Aysel Kara was killed by a man. Meanwhile, a movie about Galip will be shoot and an actor called Engin Secim was hired to portray him. Galip is so thrilled that he gives permission to Engin to observe him. But soon, Engin starts to become like Galip and behaves like him.

4.title: Dervis kafasini çarpiyor
4.plot: Galip meets with a man who said him that he got some news about Belgin's killer. But Galip says that the news are wrong and he struggles with the man. The man beats him with a iron bar and leaves fainted Galip in the back of his truck. When Galip wakes up, he finds himself in Tarakli, a little town in Sakarya Province and finds out that he was robbed and he lost his memory. A woman called Saniye wants to benefit from his state and she introduces him as her husband to everyone. A waitress called Secil was killed and with his lost memory, Galip tries to solve the murder.

5.title: Dervis ve Yeni Arkadas
5.plot: Sevda Emek, a friend of Galip was murdered after her trip to Greece. When Galip was shopping in a supermarket, he meets with a man called Ercan. They become friends and Galip gives importance so much to their friendship. Hulya and Izzet become suspicious about Ercan, but Galip defends him against them. Meanwhile Sevda's boyfriend, who was a suspect, was found murdered in a restaurant and Galip tries to solve the double murder.

6.title: Dervis Disçiye Gidiyor
6.plot: During the investigation of the murder of two police officer during the robbery of an armored money vehicle, Ahmet suffers from toothache. Izzet forces him to go the dentist and while he was unconscious, he witnesses a murder committed by the dentist and his assistant. When Ahmet tells that, nobody believes him. Because of that, he quits from his job and decides to become a singer. Meanwhile, Galip reluctantly goes to the dentist and solves both cases.

7.title: Dervis Hiçbir Sey Göremiyor
7.plot: A man attacks Galip at a fire station and Nevzat, the fireman who was beside Galip is killed, while Galip is blinded by a chemical thrown to his eyes. Galip turns his blindness to an advantage and solves the incident at the fire station.

8.title: Dervis ve Bayan Dervis
8.plot: Hulya sees a woman similar to Belgin in a café and follows her. She hears that she made up the story that she was killed by a bomb just for protecting Galip and now she was came up for reaching some documents of her friend Gokce. When trying to get the key of the storage, she accidentally kills Gokce's father. Galip learns that after a while and he becomes devastated by the possibility of Belgin may be alive.

9.title: Dervis ve Komadaki Katil
9.plot: Elif Kilic, who was in a dispute with his brothers because of inheritance, kills by a blowing bomb which was mailed to her. Police thinks that the suspect is Elif's brother Altan, because her other brother Alper is in a coma. Galip finds out that the other brother mailed the bomb and nobody believes to him. Meanwhile, Hulya's ex - husband Naim shows up in Yusuf's birthday and tells that he wants Hulya and Yusuf back again to his life. Hulya decides to move to Adana, where Naim lives but soon she finds out that she fooled by him.

10.title: Dervis Hastaneye Gidiyor
10.plot: Galip goes to a hospital because of his persistent nose bleeding and finds his doctor, Zeki Ozan Senel, dead in his office. Zeki was killed with a oxygen tube and there are two suspects: Civan Cakircali, a 82-year-old patient and Selim Topuz, a surgeon who also works in the same hospital. Galip tries to solve the case, but finds himself in an unexpected situation.

11.title: Dervis Tiyatroya Gidiyor
11.plot: Hulya's sister Nazan accidentally stabs his co-star Erhan during her live performance. Although the knife was fake, Erhan dies. Hulya asks for help to Galip to prove that Nazan is innocent.

12.title: Dervis ve Beyaz Yilbasi
12.plot: Izzet receives a bottle of wine as a new year present. He loses his present to Nihat, one of the workers in office, and gives the bottle to him. When Nihat drinks the wine, he becomes poisoned and dies. All the people thinks that Omer Tuncel sent this gift to Izzet, but they soon realize that the reality is different that they thought.

13.title: Dervis ve Digeri
13.plot: While doing a investigation about a robbery which was ended with a murder, Galip meets with a clumsy detective called Cafer. Everyone got surprised, because Cafer has received many important clues about the murder. Because of that, Galip becomes jealous of him and tries to learn how Cafer got this clues.

14.title: Dervis ve Kayip Nine
14.plot: A 70 year old woman was kidnapped and her granddaughter Yeter, asks Galip for help. As a payoff, she promises to Galip that she would make him return to his old job with talking to his professor in law faculty. Soon, the kidnappers set her grandmother for a little ransom. At first, everyone thinks that she was kidnapped from an anarchist group, but soon Galip discovers the reality.

15.title: Dervis Ressam Oluyor
15.plot: In a junk store, an unknown person is found dead. Dr. Firat advises Galip to get a hobby and when he sees the paintings in the store, he starts to attend art classes. Meanwhile, a second incident occurs and the owner of the junk store, Muhsin is also found dead. Galip thinks that two people are murdered by someone. An Azerbaijani businessman buys one of Galip's paintings and Galip becomes very happy because he starts to earn too much money from his paintings.

16.title: Dervis ve Gazeteci Çocuk
16.plot: A paperboy is murdered in front of Galip's home. At first, it seems like that the murder is happened because of a newspaper, but the two newspapers which were left in Galip's door are stolen. Galip and Hulya reads all the news in newspapers to find some clue. Soon, a man who works in the supermarket where Galip and Hulya bought the newspapers is found dead. Also, Galip's neighbor Hayri becomes involved in the unsolved cases with his girlfriend, Gulten.

17.title: Dervis Hipnoz Oluyor

imdb.plot outline: He's an extraordinary hero! It's not like no ones ever seen! Galip Dervis, the numerous phobias and obsessions to fall from time to time with the funny situations, which can be seen perhaps most surprising, the most preposterous is the most intelligent man. He is a genius. However, the news that the whole world is turned upside down one morning. Documents wife love of his life, the result of the explosion of a bomb placed in the car is lost forever. This Dervis returns exponentially terrible trauma because of all the obsessions and phobias. Galip Dervis decommissioned. Izzet superintendent, Dervis pull turn, Hulya nurse to recover the amount. Dervis, although police no longer actually, if not superior intelligence, the ability and Sally's support, the important and unsolved cases from the organization "consultant" starts to health. Dervis, who set up the dream of every event that will be returned to the police to solve, continues to search for the murderer of his wife. This is one event can not be solved until today. But whatever the wife will never stop searching for the killer...
